title: Mark PulseBrief as Public Preview with footer note

requirements.text: Add a Public Preview note to the global footer so it appears across the app (including Landing and authenticated app shell), using exactly this English copy: "PulseBrief is in public preview. Some features are limited. Pro (£19/month) coming soon." Place the note in the footer without changing the existing compliance disclaimer text: "Informational only. Not financial advice."

quotes:
Yes, mark it as Public Preview.

Use this note:
"PulseBrief is in public preview. Some features are limited. Pro (£19/month) coming soon."

Place the note in the footer.

acceptanceCriteria: The footer renders the note exactly as: "PulseBrief is in public preview. Some features are limited. Pro (£19/month) coming soon."
The note is visible in the footer on all routes/pages where the existing footer is shown (e.g., Landing and AppShell pages).
The existing compliance disclaimer text remains unchanged and continues to read exactly: "Informational only. Not financial advice."
No other user-facing copy, features, access logic, or page layouts are modified beyond adding this footer note.

constraints: Frontend-only change (copy/presentation only); no backend changes.
Do not alter any existing features, gating logic, or routing behavior.
Do not change the existing compliance disclaimer copy: “Informational only. Not financial advice.”
Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not rebuild, redeploy, or create a new draft preview; rely on the existing deployed preview (only update labeling/copy in the specification scope).
nonGoals: Implementing new Research access logic or changing Research page content.
Adding payment/checkout or changing Pro entitlement behavior.
Adding new pages or navigation items.
Changing header content; the Public Preview labeling request should be satisfied via the footer note only.
